verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in Thee In that deep love of Thine My Jesus Lord Thou Lamb of God divine Down closely down As living branch with tree I would abide My Lord My Christ in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in Thee My Savior God I know How love of Thine So vast in me may flow My empty vessel Running o'er with joy Must overflow To Thee without alloy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in Thee Nor doubt - nor self - nor sin Can e'er prevail With Thy blest life within Joined to Thyself Communing deep my soul Know naught Besides its motions to control{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide in Thee 'Tis thus I only know The secrets Of Thy mind e'en while below All joy and peace And knowledge of Thy word All pow'r and fruit And service for the Lord{/lang-eng}
